name: SupportTethysAndEwan
_source: speak;Tethys;Ewan!|How many times am I going to have to say it?|This isn't a field trip.|Please promise me you'll behave.
speak;Ewan;Oh, you don't have to worry about me.|But since I'm here, I'd like to be of use.|Otherwise I'm just in the way.|You gotta let me do something.
speak;Tethys;You have a point, but you're still too young.
speak;Ewan;Too young?|I'm not a child anymore!|I can look after myself!
speak;Tethys;What are you talking about?|You're not a full-fledged mage, are you?

speak;Ewan;Well, no, not yet.|But someday I'm gonna be one of the best mages ever!|These soldiers recognize my talent.|That's why I'm here on the battlefield.|Just watch me!|You wouldn't say that I'm too young or inexperienced if you saw me!
speak;Tethys;Wait!|Ewan, wait up!|Oh, he's gone...|Only a child would say something like, “Just watch me.”
speak;Ewan;Hey, Tethys.|You've been getting pretty chummy with that guy lately.
speak;Tethys;What do you mean, Ewan?|Who's “that guy”?
speak;Ewan;You know, THAT guy.|Look, he's right over there...|And that guy waving his sword around...|I'd say you've been a little too friendly with all of them!
speak;Tethys;Too friendly?|I wonder.|I think chatting now and again is normal.|Wait a minute...|Ewan, are you feeling jealous?
speak;Ewan;D-don't be stupid.|That's not it at all!

speak;Tethys;Hold on.|You know, that man told me he found a frog in his boots the other day.|And that man woke up to find half his moustache shaved off.|You wouldn't know anything about that, would you?
speak;Ewan;N-no.|This is the first I've heard of it.
speak;Tethys;Ooh!|It WAS you, wasn't it?|Ewan, you can't do things like that.|Even if it is kind of funny.
speak;Ewan;But they're morons!|All they do is get you to dance, and then they run around on the battlefield challenging each other to “contests of strength and valor”!
speak;Ewan;They're dumb braggarts, and I was just taking 'em down a peg.|But I'm not jealous!
speak;Tethys;All right, all right.|I'll keep your secret this time, but you must stop!
speak;Ewan;They're the troublemakers, you know?|Oh...OK.|I got it.|I'll leave 'em alone. But, Tethys?
speak;Ewan;I'll always be here to protect you.|I'm not too young for that!|So instead of always helping those guys, dance for me once in a while.|I know it'll make me stronger!
speak;Ewan;I'll see you later!|You gotta promise to dance for me!
speak;Ewan;It's not such a good idea for you to dance too close to the front lines.
speak;Tethys;Hee hee!|Thanks for worrying about me, Ewan.|But are you sure it's not just the jealousy talking?
speak;Ewan;Th-that's not it at all!|It's dangerous!|That's it!
speak;Tethys;I'm sorry, I'm sorry.|But you know, Ewan...|Since you joined up with the army, you really have gotten stronger.
speak;Ewan;I have, haven't I?|So I'm no longer a novice, right?
speak;Tethys;No, you've truly grown.|I'm glad, but also a little sad.
speak;Ewan;Hmm.|So when I'm a full-fledged mage, you're gonna be sad?
speak;Tethys;I guess so.|A little sad, anyways.|I'm so much older than you that I've always thought of you as a child.|That's why I always thought I had to protect you.
speak;Ewan;You know, at the beginning of all of this I really was treating it like a game.|Then I saw the dangers you faced to help everyone.|I knew I couldn't treat it like a game any longer.

speak;Ewan;Battles threaten people's lives and need to end quickly.|That's why I need to boost my powers.|I want to help you and the others.|I have to become a full-fledged mage to really do my part.|So, don't be sad.|I just want to protect you...
speak;Ewan;You've been looking after your little brother for so many years.|Now it's my turn to return the favor.|I mean, I am the man of the family.|So from now on, I'm gonna be helping you out.

speak;Tethys;Thank you, Ewan.|Hearing you say that makes me very happy.|It proves to me how much you've truly grown.|But that doesn't mean you need to rush off on your own or anything.|If I thought you didn't need me anymore, I would feel really sad.
speak;Ewan;There's no reason to get all weepy.|No matter how old I get, you'll always be my big sister.|My one and only.
